summary.span: 管理專案持續性，並使用主機所實作的儲存和載入作業，來儲存並擷取程式碼及其他項目。

span.span: Manages project persistence and stores and retrieves code and other items using save and load operations implemented by the host.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string LoadElement(string name) cil managed
Public Function LoadElement (name As String) As String

param.name: name
param.span: 要載入的程式碼項目名稱。

span.span: The name of the code item to be loaded.

param.span: 當載入專案檔時，這可能是 Null 參考。

span.span: This can be a null reference when loading the Project file.

summary.span: 取得先前使用 方法儲存的來源字串。

span.span: Gets the source string previously saved using the method.

returns.span: 傳回與名稱參數相關聯的原始程式碼項目內容。

span.span: Returns the contents of the source-code element associated with the name parameter.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SaveElement (string name, string source);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SaveElement(string name, string source) cil managed
Public Sub SaveElement (name As String, source As String)
public: void SaveElement(System::String ^ name, System::String ^ source);

param.name: name
param.span: 要與指定之來源項目產生關聯的名稱。

span.span: A name to associate with the specified source item.

param.span: 當儲存專案檔時，這可能是 Null 參考。

span.span: This can be a null reference when saving the Project file.
The source string for the item.

summary.span: 以指定名稱參數儲存任意來源字串，然後可以在 方法的呼叫中使用該字串來重新載入字串。

span.span: Saves an arbitrary source string with a given name parameter, which can then be used in a call to the method to reload the string.
